item.description:
Skip breakfast and don't eat lunch, it's time for an all sugar day! And of course the most important day in all of Rhode Island's history once again, it's the Great Cupcake Championship!

Numerous confectionery cupcakery establishments will battle for the supreme title of ultimate cupcake! Why not partake in the festivities? Here's the details in short:

Tickets are $10.

You get:  all you can eat cupcakes, fresh local milk, and coffee

IMPORTANT:

- Last year tickets sold out real fast, so buy now!

- Buy tickets here:

http://rifoodfights.ticketleap.com/cupcakechampionship/dates/Mar-10-2013_at_0100PM

- Plan on bringing tupperware. Last year there was a lot of extra cupcakes.

- Last years pictures: http://www.meetup.com/newintown-995/photos/6602742/

- If you plan on attending, I'm not your baby sitter, I expect you to come and find me. I'll keep you posted on my attire so you can easily find me.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sporting a blue and white striped rugby shirt
item.name: The 2nd Annual Great Cupcake Championship
